dublin_core.dcvalue: In this paper we introduce the concept of semantic Wireless Body Area Network sWBAN First the method for semantic interpretation of body sensor data is developed This method is then illustrated for the case of ECG monitoring providing the user with real time monitoring and interpretation of heart activity Finally possible extensions of the method to data fusion and context aware monitoring are discussed
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
